amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 109-266 to express the sense of Congress regarding the legislative intent to protect from the taking by the Federal government for economic development or for private use of the property owned, either by assignment, intestate succession, or by record, by survivors of Hurricane Katrina.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
